ocrd-tables.description: Fuse column regions and text lines into table cell TextRegions using DBSCAN (no ReadingOrder).

col_pad_frac.description: Horizontal padding added to each column band as a fraction of table width.

split_min_len_px.description: Discard fragments shorter than this after splitting at column borders.

row_halfspan.description: Half of row band height in units of line spacing (0.5 → ±0.5*S).

header_top_frac.description: Top fraction of table treated as header (no split across columns).

snap_eps_S.description: Tolerance for snapping line y to row anchors, as a fraction of spacing S.

merge_factor.description: If two adjacent row bands overlap by ≥ this fraction, merge them.

row_requires_line.description: Emit a row only if at least one line snaps into it.

keep_noise_rows.description: Keep unassigned lines as singleton rows instead of attaching to nearest.

dbscan_eps.description: DBSCAN eps in units of spacing S (if fallback is enabled).
